page.title: 05FACHELL FARM. SECOND PAGE.
page.content: The remaining 158 acres are for{ {GRAZING}or for{HAY}production.A herd of 85{DAIRY CATTLE}is kept and these produce an average daily{MILK YIELD}of 400 gallons.From late Spring to early Autumn the cattle graze in the fields.During the Winter they are fed on{SILAGE}and are under cover.The silage is produced on the farm.Individual records are kept for each cow and monthly milk returns are sent to the Milk Marketing Board.During the winter months there are 300{SHEEP}on the farm,these are wintered for hill farmers as there is not so much good grass on the hill farms in the winter months.The livestock are sold in{markets}in { {ABERGELE} or in{ST.ASAPH.}
